backupDesc.message: Login to the same Google account on different devices can be automatically synchronized (except for extension alias)

emptyShowListCon.message: No enabled extensions in this group!

extDesr.message: Manage extensions, Quickly enable/disable, Support batching operation, Smart sorting. Fast, Simple and Secure.

feedback_answer1.message: Click the extension icon to enable and disable the extension.

feedback_answer2.message: We encourage users to group extensions, and 'locking' means that the extension is tied to the group. When you need to enable some extensions temporarily, you can click the extension icon to enable(disable) the extension. After you are finished, click the reset button to restore the extension group status.

feedback_desc.message: Have any suggestions for improvements, questions, notice missing configuration options, or found a bug? To help improve experiences with this extension I would be very grateful for any and all feedback given or you might have.

feedback_error_amount.message: Number of screenshots uploaded exceeds limit

feedback_error_filesize.message: File size is too large (> 1 MB)

feedback_fail.message: Your message could not be sent. Please try again.

feedback_headline.message: This may be of interest to you

feedback_suggestion1.message: How do I quickly enable and disable extensions?

fixGroupDesc.message: Extensions under a fixed grouping will remain on at all times.

fixGroupOperat.message: Click the extension icon to colorize to lock it into the group

nameExtDesc.message: Give each extension a name you like

nameExtOperat.message: Click the modify icon to name the extension. Turn on this function in the general settings to take effect. Due to browser restrictions, aliases cannot be automatically synchronized for the time being.

optionGroupDelete.message: Are you sure to delete this group?

optionGroupDesc.message: Using grouping, you can flexibly switch to different scenes such as home or company, to make management more convenient.

optionGroupOperat.message: Under the selected group, click the extension icon to colorize to lock it into the group

optionNameModifyName.message: Enter extension alias, 8 characters are recommended

optionRuleDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?

otherDesc.message: you can also give a favorable comment or provide support suggestions at the Chrome Web Store.

otherDonate.message: If you are satisfied with it, you can give me a donation and encourage me to continue to improve it for free :-)

otherEdgeDesc.message: you can also give a favorable comment or provide support suggestions at the Edge Web Store.

resetTipContent.message: The meaning of reset is to remove the unlocked extension from the current group and restore the state of the current group. It is recommended that you group or lock extension first.

resetTipTitle.message: If this is your first time using the reset function

rightMoreDesc.message: To get more functions by right-clicking the extension icon

ruleExtDesc.message: Manage related extensions according to different websites

ruleTipContent1.message:
Scenario:Enter the Amazon shopping website and open the Honey extension

Rule:Match url[*amazon.com*],Extension[Honey]

ruleTipContent2.message:
What are wildcards

The asterisk * matches zero or more characters.

The question mark ? matches exactly one character.


Note that rules beginning with *. are specially treated, will match both the subdomain and itself.

Example: *.example.com will match www.example.com,AND example.com as well.

To match subdomains only, use two asterisks like, **.example.comã€‚


Example

Pattern:*.example.com (or .example.com)

Matching:a.example.com, a.b.example.com, example.com

Not matching:example.test, example.com.test, anotherexample.com


Multi-domain matching

Match all pages of amazon and taobao:*amazon.com*|*taobao.com*


Common configurations

Match all pages of amazon:*amazon.com*

Match taobao product page:*item.taobao.com*

ruleWildMulti.message: Support multi domain matching, separated by |

showBadgeDesc.message: Show the total number of the temporarily enabled extensions (enabled but unlocked extensions) in the toolbar ico, i.e. extension badge

showExtNameDesc.message: Show its name when hovering over extension icon

showFastDesc.message: Quick settings Icon in pop-up panel

showGridExtDesc.message: In the left Name Settings, set the extension alias, otherwise display the default alias name

showGridExtName.message: Show extension names in grid mode

showGridExtTip.message: [Order by name] rule will be changed to [Order by alias]

speedManageDesc.message: Click once to disable all (except for themes & locked extensions)

speedManageLock.message: Click the Extension Icon to Lock/Unlock it:
